fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Call for a turkey dinner: role stopping every non-town for a single night. (One use)

fields.name: Grateful for:
fields.value: Have the person you visit be grateful for something that might happen to them this night. The host will redirect any abilities to make this possible.(2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host can at most redirect 3 people. If any more need to be redirected, the action will fail.
- You may not target yourself.
- If the thing they are grateful for has nothing to do with them, then the host is only allowed one re-direction.
- Your visit is astral.
